text: Shannon did a phenomenal job with our wedding photos! She was receptive to our ideas, was incredibly responsive, and recommended a beautiful location by the beach where we had our ceremony. text: Shannon did a fantastic job at our wedding on Valentine's Day. She understood how I wanted to capture our ceremony, patiently gave me all the shots I wanted and she did a great job editing the final prints. She's worth every penny! Highly recommend !

name: Megan Simmons
text: Shannon did a wonderful job photographing our wedding. My husband explained what he was looking for and she took his ideas and made them a reality. She was patient and professional. Would definitely recommend her to anyone looking for professional pictures.

name: Maddy
text: Shannon is a great choice to photograph your special occasion.  We used her for our wedding, maternity, and newborns!  We are very happy with her work!

name: K R DePorter
text:
This was our first time ever being professionally photographed and Shannon surpassed ALL of our expectations.  She is incredibly passionate about what she does. She is extremely down to earth and makes you feel very comfortable.  She captured some really beautiful moments and we are so so pleased with the results.
Shannon is very flexible.  She was more than willing to reschedule/add more time for inclement weather, etc.
I would highly recommend Shannon for all of your photography needs and events! <3 <3

name: Valerie Monismith
text: June 2021. I hired Shannon to do family photos on the beach as well as wedding photos on the beach for my oldest son. We had a great afternoon with Shannon.  She was so easy going, and calm throughout the process.  We have a large family.  Along with our 5 children and their significant others we also had grandchildren, my mom and brother and friends as well as the brides mom and sister.  Shannon worked in separate family shots for all who were there as well as full family shots, wedding shots and it all went very smoothly and was a lot of fun.  We wanted these to be casual and for it to be a fun event and that is what it was with Shannon.  She was such a nice person and great with the kids.  We received all of  our photos within 7 weeks which is great.  With wedding photos and especially with as many shots as Shannon took this is well within the normal 2 month time frame most photographers have in their contract.  We had a great experience with Shanmon from start to finish with good communication along the way.  Highly recommend.

name: Genny Dubus
text: Very professional and very patient. We loved the photos.

name: Adrienne Gustin
text: Amazing, could not have asked for a more down to earth person to take our photos. It was quite the day but glad the weather was amazing and she captured our moment perfectly.. We even took pictures another day with her and I couldn't he happier. Thank you again!!

name: Isabela Oliveros
text: My whole family loved her pictures. Not only is the final result stunning but she made us all feel comfortable at the wedding photoshoot. Great work!!

name: Brittany Knapp
text: We were married 3 days after the start of the COVID-19 shut down. We had three days to find another venue (because ours cancelled), we ended up having our wedding 30-45mins from our original venue, and cutting our guest list in half. Which meant a longer drive for Shannonography a completely different setting, and a much different guest amount, but from the start she was down with making the longer drive, made suggestions but was not pushy if I was uncomfortable, showed up on time and I couldn't ask for better pictures from the best day of our life so far

name: Ariel morrow
text:
Planning a destination wedding without meeting any of your vendors is terrifying but Shannon completely alleviated all of my fears. I found her on Google and was immediately impressed with her work and quality of photos. She promptly responded to my message and by that afternoon I had signed a contract. We emailed back and forth and had several phone calls in the months leading up to my wedding. She listened to my vision and had many wonderful recommendations.
The day of my wedding she arrived on time and in great spirits which helped me to relax and enjoy my day! Shannon is extremely easy going and fun to work with, she even let me have an impromptu boudoir session as I was getting dressed. My ceremony was perfect and she captured every sweet moment of the day. She shot the entire reception and took some really fun photos of the after party. My family and friends loved her and she fit right in with us and felt like part of our big day! My cousin and a coworker who did not attend my wedding, both loved my portraits so much they booked sessions with her and both had great experiences and photos as well! We will definitely be doing family portraits with her on the beach next summer! Don't hesitate to book Shannon!!

name: Sandra Gonzalez
text: Shannon was wonderful to have you on that special day, great professionalism and commitment to your work.  I congratulate you.

name: Alma Meza
text: Shannon is one talented women, the pictures she took for my God-daughters wedding in Florida were amazing, we enjoyed her company during the whole wedding. Thank you Shannon for your amazing work. I will most definitely recommend your awesome work.

name: Alisha K Posada
text:
I would not recommend this vendor to anyone. We live in Ohio and were traveling to florida for our dream beach wedding. Due to the COVID-19 situation, we had to cancel our wedding as Florida law prohibited us from staying in our vacation rentals and we would be under a mandatory 2 week quarantine. I contacted Shannon to cancel and had only paid our deposit. We were hoping to get some of that money back as this was out of our control, but instead it turned into a downward spiral that was very unprofessional. We were told our money would not be returned (even though no contract was signed) and after stating we were contacting the Attorney General was met with "threaten me to try to ruin my life or livelihood, as unjust, wrong, or vile as I think that is. "

I have never been the person to leave a bad review or bad mouth someone. I won't even send back my food in restaurants if it's wrong, but this has been a terrible experience I would never wish this upon anyone. I had read other bad reviews, but I never trust just one person's experience... maybe now I will.

name: L. Wise
text: We loved our pics taken by Shannon! She was so much fun!!! We had a beach wedding ceremony in Navarre, Florida! We really appreciate the services while we were so far from home!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Lori.  It was my pleasure.  If you are ever back in town, I would love to hear from you.  Merry Christmas!

name: Paris Bryant
text: I was a bridesmaid in my best friend Brittney's wedding and it was a disgrace to watch the photographer not do what she was paid to do.  While getting dressed she spent more time taking pictures of the wedding rings than of the girls and the bride. After the ceremony she kept asking what kind of poses we wanted to do instead of being creative and telling us. During the reception she walked around smoking, at the bar, fixing a to go plate which were plenty of real plates because we were at a nice restaurant (she just chose to grab a to go plate because she wanted food to go, so you a lie!) and eating off the kids buffet (which was for children 12 and under only, you wrote it yourself). She didn't even get any pictures of the bride and father dance, none of the wedding favor's table, or food table.  All those pictures came from family who took their own pictures and sent it to the bride. The bride was very upset because of the money she spent to capture her one and only wedding day and to be told that most of the pictures were destroyed only after she kept hassling the photographer for months. Nothing was destroyed, she just realized that she was doing more eating, smoking and drinking and didn't have enough pictures.  Thank god family and friends were there to help capture the moments.  I would not lie about any of this...God knows everything i have written is all true! I guess she's picking how great she is with different brides because she was not great at all. If you take your business seriously, treat everyone the same because all money spends the same.

name: TC McNeil Shepherd
text: Shannon's work is unparalleled. Her passion shines through, and her attention to detail creates such a romantic feel. I highly recommend her!

name: Dede Dase
text: Shannon was a true gem for our wedding pictures.  She was able to meet all of our requests - pictures on our Vespa, helped us move our arbor, and amazing sunset pictures!  I am certain we will be having anniversary pictures done by her!

name: Heather Stewart
text: Shannon is one of the best photographers I’ve ever used for an event!!!  We had the perfect weather for a beach wedding and the pictures or absolutely gorgeous.   Thank you Shannon!

resp.text: It was an absolute pleasure, Heather.  Thank you so much for allowing me to capture one of the most important days of your life!

name: Taylor A
text: We had an absolutely wonderful experience with Shannonography! She is very professional, had amazing pose ideas, and every shot in our gallery is stunning! 10/10 would recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Taylor.  You and Michael were so awesome to work with.  I still can't get over the photos we got.  I love them so much!

name: Brittney Alexander
text: Worst experience ever! If you want all of your wedding photos DO NOT book her! She is so unprofessional and you will not receive all of your photos! She lied several times as to when my gallery would be completed and then when she did upload it she had the nerve to send me an email telling me she lost some of my pictures due to a memory card malfunction! I have maybe 5 good wedding pictures I’m proud to show! Your wedding is one of the most important days of your life and can’t be redone! Please save yourself the heartache, pain, or lawsuit! I wish someone would of warned me! And not to mention..she ate more food then any of my guest did at my wedding instead of taking pictures like she should of! She also was at the bar and took a “to go” plate! Just so damn unprofessional! I have no first dance pics, father/daughter dance pics, no pics of my cake/decor! No good wedding party pics, first kiss pics...just NOTHING! I reached out to someone else who’s wedding she photographed and they had the exact same complaints!

name: Lexi Dettelbach
text: I was the bride and found her on google, saw pictures and thought she did a good job. She also had her daughter "work" as a photographer too but she didn't actually do anything. While we were all getting ready she spent more time taking pictures of the rings, my shoes, the dress and makeup tray than my actual wedding party and myself. Then, she decided to invite her daughter, daughter's boyfriend and granddaughter up to my reception and eat (crab, steak....). Her daughter got so drunk (she's like 26 ) and she was all over my 15 year old nephew, it was disgusting behavior. She didn't even get me walking out where they introduced us as husband and wife. I got the pictures back and I was very disappointed.  The pictures were off centered and she didn't tell me to do any poses, I had to come up with everything. All in all, not professional in my opinion.

name: Stefani Chavez
text: Shannon’s photos are absolutely stunning. She has a unique artistic perspective that makes what she captures superior to what I see from other photographers. I highly recommend her! Our family photos are always celebrity quality for a really fair price ❤️❤️

resp.text: Thank you so much, Stefani.  It is always a pleasure to photograph your family.  I especially love getting to capture your beautiful children year after year.  They are so cuuuuute!

name: Duke Ofearl
text: Shannon photographed our Navarre Beach destination wedding in March and went above and beyond. Very professional.  We especially loved the detail and bride and groom images.  Due to weather issues, we didn't think we were going to be able to do our couple and wedding party pics on the beach like we hoped, but Shannon stayed positive and focused on getting some other pics first and then she drove back with us from the reception site to make sure we got the pics we dre!med of.  I couldn't be happier.  She also offered our family and guests a discounted rate for family pics while we we were in town.  We plan on coming back in a few months, as we just found out we are expecting and want her to capture the start of our family.  If we can, we plan on coming back every year and doing family pics.  She still offers the discount even though our wedding was in March.  I highly recommend her.  Great prices too!

resp.text:
Hi, Dan & Morgan.  Omg!  Congratulations!!  Wow.  I can't wait.  I know you both have to be so excited.  Isn't that what your Mom was teasing you about, Morgan.  haha

Your wedding was perfect.  Your families were amazing.  Thank you both so much for making me feel like part of the crew and being willing to do what it takes to get the perfect image.  My favorite has to be when you both laid in the sand for the most amazing shot EVER.  That had better be going on a canvas!  I had a blast with the wedding party images too.  Your friends were hysterical.  I told you we would have a perfect sunset.  It was definitely worth the drive back.

I am so happy for you both and can't wait to meet the little one!  <3  Woo hoo!

name: Kellie Tubb
text: Shannon is on time, professional and a little quirky!  Everytime we go to the beach she is available for pictures.  Wouldn't use anyone else!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Melika.  You and Gerald are one of my favorite couples from 2018.  Watching the love you share and watching the love of your families touched me so much.  I am so happy for you both and hope to see you again when you are in town.  May 2019 be your best year yet!

name: brian abston
text: We hired this photographer to handle our wedding and also video.  She should never ever do another wedding again as that day is one of the most special days one can have and the pictures taken will last through generations.  All of her pics included everything except our faces.  Ring pics, holding hands pics, walking away together pics and plenty of everyone else but we didn't end up with one photograph together alone showing our faces that we can hang on the wall in our home.  She also has a terrible attitude like she didn't really want to be there.  She also missed a deadline for the video to be ready for us and when questioned by my wife she was defensive and said she would issue refund immediately and destroy the video which we assume she did and then had the nerve to threaten my wife with a lawsuit for slander if she were to leave her a negative review claiming she had a lawyer on retainer for anyone leaving a poor review.  No professional in any industry would ever say such a thing unless they knew they were wrong and felt the need to try and bully rather then use customer service to fix whatever situation had arisen!  I wouldn't let her do a weeding for someone I didn't care for let alone a loved one!  Too easy to find someone else don't put yourselves in the same position as us and unable to have just one professional wedding photo for you home!

name: Ariel morrow
text:
Planning a destination wedding without meeting any of your vendors is terrifying but Shannon completely alleviated all of my fears. My family and friends loved her and she fit right in with us and felt like part of our big day! My cousin and a coworker who did not attend my wedding, both loved my portraits so much they booked sessions with her and both had great experiences and photos as well! We will definitely be doing family portraits with her on the beach next summer! Don't hesitate to book Shannon!!

We were hoping to get some of that money back as this was out of our control, but instead it turned into a downward spiral that was very unprofessional. We were told our money would not be returned (even though no contract was signed) and after stating we were contacting the Attorney General was met with "threaten me to try to ruin my life or livelihood, as unjust, wrong, or vile as I think that is. "

I have never been the person to leave a bad review or bad mouth someone. I won't even send back my food in restaurants if it's wrong, but this has been a terrible experience I would never wish this upon anyone. I had read other bad reviews, but I never trust just one person's experience... maybe now I will.

Hi, Dan & Morgan.  Omg!  Congratulations!!  Wow.  I can't wait.  I know you both have to be so excited.  Isn't that what your Mom was teasing you about, Morgan.  haha

Your wedding was perfect.  Your families were amazing.  Thank you both so much for making me feel like part of the crew and being willing to do what it takes to get the perfect image.  My favorite has to be when you both laid in the sand for the most amazing shot EVER.  That had better be going on a canvas!  I had a blast with the wedding party images too.  Your friends were hysterical.  I told you we would have a perfect sunset.  It was definitely worth the drive back.

I am so happy for you both and can't wait to meet the little one!  <3  Woo hoo!

She also has a terrible attitude like she didn't really want to be there.  She also missed a deadline for the video to be ready for us and when questioned by my wife she was defensive and said she would issue refund immediately and destroy the video which we assume she did and then had the nerve to threaten my wife with a lawsuit for slander if she were to leave her a negative review claiming she had a lawyer on retainer for anyone leaving a poor review.  No professional in any industry would ever say such a thing unless they knew they were wrong and felt the need to try and bully rather then use customer service to fix whatever situation had arisen! text: Amanda is great to work with. She takes your ideas and helps make them become reality. The quality of her pics is amazing and she is reasonably priced.

name: Alex Vega
text: Great photographer, amazing pictures, straight-forward process! I loved our photographer, Tiffany, who delivered great pictures despite it being one of the windiest days ever on that beach. She was so professional and easy-going and knew exactly how to deal with small kids and toddlers to get the best shot. Tiffany was so flexible and able to work with whatever we wanted to do. The price is clear and you get a gallery of all your images with the ability to purchase prints and/or download your images. Every other photographer I talked to had some ridiculous pricing or complicated process that muddied the experience. Would not hesitate to use this company again in the future, especially if all their photographers are as good as Tiffany is!

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Alex!

name: Sarah Tinsley
text: We had a multi-family shoot during our recent trip to Gulf Shores. Callie was so wonderful and patient with all 9 children and was able to capture some really great shots. Booking was simple, pricing was extremely easy to understand, our proofs came back super quick and Callie was very communicative and easy to work with. I absolutely recommend Shore Shooters to anyone looking for professional beach shots. We'll definitely be using them again on our next vacation!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Sarah!  We look forward to seeing you again on your next vacation!

Hi Spencer.  I wanted to look through your pictures to see if there's anything we could do to improve them.  However, I cannot seem to find you in our customer database.  Please email ron@shoreshooters.com to let me know when your session took place and the name of the person who booked the session.  Once I have this information, I'll be happy to review your pictures and see if there's anything we can do to take them from "ok" to "amazing".

Ron Wainscott
Founder / Co-Owner

name: Jessica Niko
text: Amazing experience! Our photographer worked so well with our little ones to capture the perfect beach photos. I can’t say enough good things about this company. Captured our vacation memories and no stress!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review, Jessica.  We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us!

name: Tanya Thomas
text: Shore Shooters definitely deserves this review -- two years ago we booked an appointment with one of their photographers for during our vacation. At the time, there were 9 of us, one of the couples being my brother and his wife whom we hadn't seen in quite a few years (and had no family pictures with). The photographer was very nice, however when we received our pictures, every single picture was in soft focus -- we could only order 2 pictures and were very disappointed. THIS IS WHERE THEY EARN THEIR 5 STARS. The manager and then owner worked with me and was very apologetic. They offered to accommodate us for a family shoot if we were ever in the area again. Luckily, 2 years later we were (this past July). I contacted them in January. They booked us with April, who was amazing. She drove all the way from Gulf Shores (2+ hours) for our shoot. The pictures turned out amazing. She was relaxed and fun. We could not be happier with the way this whole situation evolved and turned out. THANK YOU Shore Shooters and April for having amazing customer service.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review, Tanya.

name: Brenda Richmond
text: Austin did such a spectacular job of capturing all 14 of us in various antics.  I cannot recommend Shore Shooters Beach Photography enough.  Memories have been captured for all time.

resp.text: Thank you, Brenda.  We really appreciate you taking the time to leave this review!

name: Melissa Tanner
text: We had an AMAZING experience! Britney got so many amazing images of my family in a short period of time, we had 18 month old twins, a 3 year old and a 7 year old so the attention span was short. The results far exceeded our expectations. I cannot recommend them highly enough.

name: Sheri Goddard
text: So amazing. I am absolutely blown away. She did both the posed family shots and a ton of candids!!! I could not have asked for a more terrific experience and stunning outcome.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Sheri.  We're so happy to hear that you had a great experience and are enjoying your photos!

name: Stacy Burgoon
text: Our experience with Shore Shooters was excellent from start to finish. This was our first trip to Gulf Shores, I found Shore Shooters online and was impressed with their online gallery, as well as the user friendly website, so easy to set up the appointment and make online payments. Communication was professional and friendly. We were a little nervous taking a gamble on an online appointment, but as soon as we met our photographer Dannie, as well as the owner, we were excited and ready to have fun.  It is obvious all the team members enjoy their work and give each family a special experience. Dannie was wonderful, he is kind and funny, and recommended several things for us to check out on our trip.  He had a great plan of locations and poses, but also let our children come up with ideas of their own, and those photos wound up being some of my favorites. I purchased the package with the flash drive, our photos were mailed within 48 hours and the drive was in our mailbox when we arrived home just as advertised. The photos came out just as I hoped, Dannie really did a great job of taking great shots that captured our family having fun, which was exactly what I wanted. Start to finish our experience with Shore Shooters was great, if we return to Gulf Shores we would absolutely work with Shore Shooters and Dannie again.

name: Brandi Crider
text: Our photographer Brittany from Shore Shooters was fantastic! We had a large (18+) family plus a couple of family friends and she got so many amazing shots! She even got all 18 of us looking and smiling! Thank you Brittany for capturing so many amazing memories for us!

name: Lindsay Jordan
text: We had photos done this past summer (late June) by Trisha and were very pleased with the way they turned out.  Yes, beach photos come at a cost; however, we wound up with more than 150 shots that we can do whatever we want with!  I've never had that kind of package deal with any other photographer.  We picked Trisha because most of the sessions featured on her profile page were of families, and we have a 4 year old who hates photos.  It was a great choice!  By the end, he was begging her to take his picture.  She really captured our casual, fun-loving family as accurately as possible.  We were all soaked from splashing in the ocean when we were finished, but it was totally worth it!

name: Jordan Fiorenza
text: Got our engagement pictures done through Shore shooters! They were incredible! Coached us through the whole thing!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review, Jordan!

text: Great experience! Very good photographer!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Debra!  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to write this!

name: Vanessa Sewell
text:
We used SS at Orange Beach in June 2016 and our photographer was Crisco Zills. He was exactly what one would want in a beach photographer: relaxed but upbeat, patient, fun, very aware and watching for a moment to grab a great picture. Our family had 2 two-year-olds so getting the shot wasn't always easy, but Crisco managed to snag some amazing shots, as well as keeping both the little ones entertained and laughing. (Seriously, my boy hates people and Crisco had him throwing his head back in laughter.) When I saw our pictures for the first time I was in tears at how beautifully they turned out. My father is a professional photographer and we agree that not just anyone can take an amazing picture no matter how much the camera or editing software costs. Crisco can. Your money will be well spent here.

Special shout out to the editors! They polish the gems and enhance their natural beauty!  Fantastic work!

resp.text:
I am so sorry to hear that you were disappointed with your pictures.  Our office manager will be getting in touch with you regarding a refund.  In addition, if you ever come back to any of the areas we serve, please let us know.  We'd like to arrange a complimentary session for your family to try to make it right.  Again, I am very sorry you were unhappy.  We'd love it if you'd give us another chance.

Ron Wainscott, Owner
Shore Shooters Beach Photography

name: Danielle Vannoy
text: Nick Frontiero is an extremely talented photographer and it truly shows when he is in the zone searching for the perfect light and angle so that he can capture special moments. He and his wonderful team, Jenna, Susan, and Shannon, made our wedding day fun and turned what could be monotonous photos into an artistic and enjoyable experience. They were extremely professional and friendly and could make even the most camera shy person feel comfortable. We appreciate their hard work and dedication and could not imagine having anyone else shoot our special day! Our pictures turned out so amazing! Nick takes time to meticulously pick the best photos from your special day and edit them to perfection. If you want a way to preserve your wedding day so that you can share it with your family and friends for years to come, then he's your guy. My husband and I opted to not get a videographer, and after getting our photos back from Nick, I know that we didn't make a mistake in doing so because he made sure to capture everything! NFP is the bomb!

name: Sarah Bryan
text: Nick Frontiero is such a wonderful photographer truly devoted to his passion for art. He brought to life every aspect of our wedding day and then some. I could not have asked for better quality photos. I am still in awe that he captured some of the most personal and sacred moments of the day in such a wonderful light. We will cherish these photos forever. What I loved most about Nick's photos are the "in the moment" pictures that he captures. Looking back through our photos, we were able to completely relive the day and look at moments we did not see on our wedding day. We received so many photos I had no idea were taken and we are so thankful to have them. He is incredibly professional and has many options for packages. I was pleased with his work from beginning to end as he went above and beyond. I highly encourage any bride to book Nick ASAP! You will not regret it! I truly do not have enough words to describe how grateful I am for Nick Frontiero Productions. Absolutely amazing!

resp.text: It was such a pleasure! Thanks so much for having me capture that special moment in your life!

name: Lyndsey J.
text:
It's difficult to put into words what an incredible experience we had with Nick and his team throughout our wedding journey. From our first meeting up to our wedding day, Nick was more than we could have asked for in a photographer. Having beautiful images that not only captured our special day but would be forever keepsakes was incredibly important and a big factor in why we selected Nick Frontiero Photography. Nick and his team captured the fine arts style I had been dreaming of while still incorporating those classic, traditional shots. Their amazing skill set is displayed in all of our wedding day images. We were blown away by the attention to detail, creativity, and the little mementos included from our special day. Not to mention, Nick's use of film along with digital really gave the unique styling we had been looking for in a photographer.

A big THANK YOU to Nick, Jenna, and Shannon for helping make our wedding day truly magical and something we will remember for a lifetime.

resp.text: We are so grateful you chose us to capture such a special time in your life! It truly means the world to us.

name: Lance Mauldin
text: Nick and his staff were incredible to work with to capture all the images for our special day.  My wife and I were blown away by the quality of the pictures and Nick's unique ability to capture special moments that we will treasure for a lifetime.  I would highly recommend Nick to anyone looking for someone that will work with you, help put you at ease, and capture the most brilliant images you could imagine.  We appreciate everything Nick did for us, and will be using him in the future for any other photography needs.

resp.text: So glad I could be part of your special day! It truly means the world to me to capture such special moments for your family!

name: Stephanie Sims
text:
Leading up to my wedding I searched & searched for photographers. I wanted one that would think outside the box & be able to capture the most memorable moments on my special day, however I found SO MUCH MORE with Nick! He was professional, a ton of fun to work with & he need little to no direction. He created a vision for me took the lead and my now husband & I followed. Our engagement & wedding photos are beyond amazing to say the least! I remember the day I received my wedding album, I cried as I turned detailed page after page.

I was completely blown away at how he took that one day & transformed it into a piece of art!!! I appreciated how hard he & his team members worked on the day of the wedding. When you hire someone to do a job & after they have completed the job you find it hard to put in words how satisfied & pleased you are with that individual, that's when you know you made the right decision!!!!

resp.text: I'm so glad you loved it so much! I appreciate you so much!!

name: Chase Watford
text:
There are absolutely not enough words to describe how thankful I am to have chosen Nick Frontiero Productions and his team to capture our day. I had a friend who used Nick and knew immediately i wanted to use him for our wedding day. Not only are his pictures absolutely gorgeous , but he goes above and beyond to give his brides exactly what they ask for. We did not know eachother before the wedding process, but now Nick and his wife Jackie are some of my most cherished friends. Nick brings a full team to shoot on the wedding day and i seriously felt like a celebrity with an entourage. There is not one moment of our day that they did not capture. I am forever grateful for this guy and his insanely cool photography skills. You will NOT regret booking Nick Frontiero Productions for your event. I can't wait to use him again for maternity and family photos one day!
Much Love,
Lindsey Watford

resp.text: It was such a pleasure! Thanks so much!!

name: Lauren Hoepfner
text: I cannot say enough good things about Nick and his team! Nick helped us to design a wedding package that worked the best for us and fit our budget. We wanted to do a lot of our pictures before the ceremony, and Nick worked with us to get everything figured out. He put together a detailed timeline for the wedding day, so we knew exactly who needed to be where and when. He and his team were so incredible to work with and captured absolutely amazing pictures of our entire wedding day. Nick also has 2 Polaroid cameras and took polaroids throughout the day. At the end of the night, he presented us with a beautiful wooden box with our names on it, full of all of the polaroids he had taken that day!! It was such an awesome surprise to have at the end of the night, and we loved getting to see a sneak peek of our wedding pictures. When our final photos came, they were PERFECT!! Thanks Nick and team for being the best and helping make our wedding day so much fun!! Y'all are the best!!

resp.text: We are so glad to be part of your special day!! We are so grateful!

name: Jenna Garrett
text: From the moment NFP started popping up, I've admired Nick's photography style - so booking him for my wedding was already a given! I've seen Nick in action, and final products, but I was speechless when I finally got into our gallery! He captured so much emotion and happiness authentically, with each image providing an excellent reminder of each individual moments of our day. One of my favorite parts of the day was getting a box of polaroids at the end of the night - along with the film shots later. He can take any space/venue and make it look elegant - even our small backyard ceremony! You can choose a photographer who's style you like, or choose a photographer who's style constantly evolves and adapts with each individual wedding. All the weddings Nick has photographed look amazing, but I don't think you fully appreciate the talent until you see yourself captured by it. He's laid-back, focused, and actually a pretty stealthy photographer. NFP is an investment worth making if you want beautiful memories captured to last a lifetime!

It's really sad to say you are a professional business but not in the business of treating your customers right. Im going to consult with my lawyer. I wouldn't ever refer someone of such poor professionalism and poor communication skills. These people won't call back even after leaving many messages. text:
voicemail and website state that they are open until 5pm.  The business' answering machine tells people that call that they are open until 5pm.  I show up at 4:10 to give this local business my money, but they were closed.
A tiny sign in the window tells you they close at 4.  Closing at 5 is ridiculous enough being that most people work until 5pm.  Also, The 'emergency number" has a full voicemail consistently.  These people make it very difficult to give them your money.  I'm going to Madison or Huntsville from now on.

text: All of my bridesmaids' dresses and groomsmen's tuxes were ordered through Michael Mason Bridal. My circumstances were especially difficult because almost every single person in the wedding party was in a different state, and two were even in another country. I let my bridesmaids choose what style dress they wanted within the brand, color, and material I picked out, and Michael Mason was always very accommodating in taking orders and measurements for all the different styles of dresses. If I had it to do over, I would use Michael Mason again!

All I signed was a sales slip that requested my name and contact information. The dress never left their store and no alterations have been made. I will never do business here again and you really shouldn’t either.

We rented a tux last year for prom and the girl was very nice but did not set the return date with us.  She just said to return the tux Monday or Tuesday. We could have practically gotten the whole shebang for that.  Then we realize that my son told her the wrong date!  We call them on Monday to correct it only to be charged an extra  $20!  So $112 just to rent a jacket and vest.  So, now, he just went to pick it up for prom TOMORROW NIGHT and they have sent it back!!!  We paid the extra for them to "hold it" and they sent it back anyeay!
Ridiculous! Go here if you want extra charges for no reaso, if you want to pay a lot for a rental OR if you want poorly handled business.  BEYOND  VERY DISAPPOINTED!

text: I cannot recommend Leslie enough!! When Leslie experienced unexpected personal medical issues just prior to my wedding, she worked tirelessly to make sure I was taken care (all the while she was undergoing treatment). She found me a replacement photographer, Alisha Crossley, and made sure I was okay with the change. She talked me through everything and assured me I was in excellent hands. And she was so right! My experience with Alisha and Patrick was the absolute best! They made me feel comfortable throughout the weekend and did not miss a shot! I seriously got the DREAM TEAM and could not be more pleased with my overall experience and the quality of my wedding pictures. Leslie's work is exceptional, and both Alisha and Leslie's combined talent truly shows in every picture!

text:
Leslie was amazing and such a blessing on my wedding day! We unfortunately had to cancel our large ceremony and reception on our original date due to COVID, and Leslie was so easy to communicate with and adjusted plans so effortlessly. Her communication and excitement before the wedding really set the tone before our big day.

The day of the wedding, Leslie was such a joy from the start. She took away all of my nerves and made me feel like a princess during my bridal shots! My husband and I didn't do engagement pictures, and I was nervous we would feel awkward in the more posed shots on the wedding day. Leslie quickly took away those worries and encouraged and directed us so well, the whole day was so much fun! Leslie was constantly cheering us on and was so excited for us!

The pictures she took were BEAUTIFUL! I have gotten so many comments about how amazing my pictures are. Leslie effortlessly knew how to make a shot feel natural and look amazing. She was also so quick to get the pictures to me, I think I had the online portfolio within a week of the wedding!

I would HIGHLY recommend Leslie to anyone that I know. She will not only give you pictures that you will cherish forever, but she will make your wedding day that much more fun and full of pure joy!

With Leslie I never struggled with that question. Besides her gorgeous photography talent, what really separated Leslie from the rest of the photographers was that she went above and beyond, some would call this customer service, but I would just call it Leslie. When Leslie called me on the phone to chat about her packages, she wanted to get to know me, wanted to know about how Chris and I met, laughed with me over the phone, answered my anxious questions about other vendors or bridal decisions, she truly went above and beyond and when I got off the phone I felt like I had made a friend. Y'all this is so important because from that moment on, I knew I wasn't just another Client, I felt like she knew us,  she was so real and sincere, I knew I could trust my day with her. I call Leslie my fairy god-photographer.... she's unbelievable. Best of all, my husband who HATES pictures, really enjoyed working with Leslie and her team, they made him feel so comfortable in front of the camera. Our photos are absolutely breathtaking. name: Tina Butts
text: After using Joel on two occasions to do photos for me and my family, I booked a Maternity Session more than 3 months in advance. During that time, I texted him to gain an understanding of what the cost would be. He asked a few questions and then never got back with me. Since I had used him on 2 other occasions (most recently 9 months ago) and his prices were reasonable... and this session would be no more work than the previous sessions, I didn't press the issue and figured we would just discuss it later. Well..when I texted him a month before the event to confirm my date, he mentioned he noticed he had never responded to my text regarding the price.  After asking a few more questions he came back with a price of $800?!?!?!??? This is almost as much as I paid for my wedding pictures and they were ABSOLUTELY GORGEOUS with tons of editing (much better than any session that we had with Joel). I have spoken with several licensed photographers since this time and NONE of them charge anywhere near this high. Going price for this type of session was $150-450 for a 1-2 hr session and digital photos (Max). Unfortunately this put me in a real bind because now it was extremely hard to find another photographer that was available for my date. Joel mentioned he would come down to $550...but this was still higher than "average". This high pricing also was not in line with the pricing on his website. Although he did not have Maternity specifically listed, he had Engagement Sessions for the same length of time (2 hr session and digital photos) for $400 and this was synonymous to my requested session since it would be only me and my husband for a couple of hours. Given that he put me in such a stressful bind at an already stressful time in my life, I would definitely NOT recommend him. I tried to work out the pricing with him to be more reasonable and even explained my issue of having troubles finding someone else this late...but he was unwilling to work with me...even though he knew that it was his fault because he never answered my text regarding pricing 3+ months ago. Do yourself a favor...use someone who responds to text messages and honors pricing listed on their website. At a minimum,  select someone who is willing to take responsibility when they make a mistake...that unfortunately does not appear to be Joel at Yellowhammer. :(

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback. We have always enjoyed working with you and your family and are glad you were so pleased with our work in the past that you decided to reach out to us for your maternity session. While we strive to accommodate almost any budget, we understand that sometimes that does not work out. While we do offer lower-priced photography collections, those price points do not include the digital copies of edited photographs that you requested. We hope you were able to use one of the many photographers we recommended, who may be able to offer a lower price point. Thanks again for your business, and we wish you all the best in the future.

name: Mernia Ganote
text:
35 sitting fee, ok, but unprofessional assistant and very disorganized isn’t a good thing, with the assistance of the younger person I ordered the economy package, a few weeks later I received a email stating ready, so went in and they weren’t the lady apologized, so a few weeks later went in, gave my name etc, the older person couldn’t find my photos asked me numerous times what name would they be under, and even if I was sure I didn’t pick them up, she went on to give excuses that she was out all month over COVID, so I made sure my hands were clean and my-mask stayed on, anyway she got on the phone chatted with whom I have no idea then stated I found them let me all you back after I get these to her and she leaves, ok well she handed me some wallets, I’m like really? This isn’t what I ordered, she is yes they are! No woman I know what I ordered I ordered while talking to an employee who told me which to click and pay, ok, I’m like just refund my money, a second later the photographer came up, asked if they made a mistake, I’m like yes, I was suppose to get the economy 8x10 2 5x7 and a few wallets, ok, I’m like I need these I’m leavin* for SC and he said they’ll be ready this after noon, the woman cuts in, were closed at 5 I’m like np I don’t live far I’ll be here, we’re I barely returned home and sat down received a call they’re ready, hmm that fast, no drying time, so I went in, arrived at the desk was told here, so I looked at them nothing really saying they were high quality, in fact they were sticky to the touch, when I stated this the woman replies have a good day and walked away, hmm, ok son looked at them and even sticky to him so he laid them out, well I posted on FB my experience and the photographer responded I’ll call you in the morning, I’m like ok, we’ll sitting in my drs office he called, I informed him of the stickiness and how I felt about this experience and not even getting a apology, we’ll bring in I’ll redo I’m like I have no time, I’m being rushed as it is trying  to get packed up for the trip, one wax a gift to my sons grandmother he placed in the frame the next day and wrapped, I told my son to unwrap so we could return and behold it’s stuck to the frame, now I’m getting text after text come in I’ll replace do this return I’m like dude I’ve been there wasted my gas and want me to keep coming in?
I called a trusted photographer who told me he should of let them dry and that with that experience he would of just refunded and offered to retake.
I the last text was trying to make the stickiness my fault over using hand sanitizer, I’m like wrong answer my hands were dried off and I didn’t use it the second time, look ppl might have good things to say but I do not, heck Walmart prints better photos then this, and trust I’ll not go back..

text: Joel and Amber are simply the best addition to any wedding team. We booked them within the first few weeks of being engaged, even with our wedding being more than a year out, and it was easily the most treasured decision we made. They have helped guide us with vendor selections, what packages to choose, and they are always very quick to respond to any message you send, and answer any questions. I can't even put into words the amount of joy and happiness they have put into our lives not only by meeting them, but by the experience we had with them. We have looked at our wedding pictures a thousand times, and we have only been married for 3 weeks. And yes, this amazing duo got us more than 800 pictures back within a week and a half of taking them, and also gave us several sneak peeks of the pictures, including the night of our wedding!! Not to mention, everyone has commented on how amazing our pictures turned out. J&A was easily the best decision we made in the entire wedding process. We are so grateful, and blessed, to know them and call them friends now.

text: I worked with Joel and Amber when I was a bridesmaid in a friend's wedding, so I knew even before I got engaged that they were the photographers I wanted for my wedding! Before the wedding, they provided so many resources and tips on wedding planning, scheduling, and other things that were so helpful! On wedding day, we were running slightly behind schedule, and they were completely calm the whole time, which made me feel calm and relaxed! They kept us moving through the photos while keeping it light and fun, making us laugh along the way! During the entire process, my husband and I felt like we were so much more than just their clients. And the most important part...our wedding pictures are BEAUTIFUL! They are something that we are going to treasure for the rest of our lives.

You girls were all so sweet to work with! We're so thankful we could help make the entire experience a little more joyful and relaxed. It was our honor to work with you guys! Hugs!

name: Farrell Robinson
text:
Joel and Amber are the first vendor you should book. They seriously made the wedding experience.

We reached out and had consultations with a few photographers. Joel and Amber made a huge impact from the first conversation. They were friendly and engaging, and they’ve been doing this for a long time so they know what they’re doing. They were familiar with our ceremony and reception venues, which made us feel comfortable. They emailed us galleries from our venues and we loved their work! My husband and I are tech nerds, and we LOVED their online client portal and interface. All of our invoices, emails, questionnaires, etc. were so organized (trust me, organization is appreciated during the crazy wedding planning process!). Joel and Amber were so flexible with our meeting times. I currently don’t live in the area, and COVID has really complicated when and where we could meet. Also, when there were issues with my wedding dress, Joel and Amber were flexible in rescheduling my bridal shoot. During the whole planning period, they sent us emails checking in, asking for details a little bit at a time so we never felt overwhelmed, and they even sent us gifts along the way! They are so kind and it showed in every single interaction. Fast forward to the day of the wedding. Joel and Amber showed up (with gifts – of course!) and had learned the names of our parents, siblings, and wedding party. They were timely and helped keep us on schedule without ever feeling pushy. Their experience was crucial here. They made the events of the day flow seamlessly. They took all the pressure off my husband and me and kept reminding us to savor the special moments. They were polite and unobtrusive. What really stood out is when we told other vendors that Joel and Amber were our photographers, the other vendors were excited! Joel and Amber are so respected in this area and field that other vendors feel more confident when they’re working together. Post wedding, we got to see our pictures so quickly!! We saw highlights that night and got all of the photos back the day we returned from the honeymoon. We didn’t have to wait months like a lot of my friends have had to do. Joel and Amber have offered us printing and album options, but have not been pushy or made us feel like we had to buy from them. All of my wedding party and guests who have had weddings commented on how amazing our photographers were. They were so surprised because their experiences with photographers was all over the map.  Joel and Amber were truly the best vendors we booked, and I highly highly recommend them!

resp.text: Wow! This is the sweetest and kindest review! Thank you so much for taking the time to share that and for loving the journey with us! We had the best time with you both! I love your spirits and the way you truly care about those around you. Hugs to you both!!!

text: Wonderful venue!  I highly recommend  J & D Farms for your wedding venue.   Friendly and accommodating owners and staff.  Beautiful barns, carriage house and grounds.

name: Sharon Iwasa Perkins
text: Just had my granddaughter’s wedding here. She’s a fan of the Keira Knightly Pride and Prejudice movie, and when I saw the chandeliers in the barn (see photo), I saw why she chose this venue. It was perfect. We had approximately 125 guests in attendance, and we fit well in both the ceremony and reception areas. While the weather was sunny and hot, they cranked up the AC in the barn. Also, my granddaughter had fans printed up and passed out, so people were fanning themselves throughout the service in true Southern style. After the ceremony, we walked across the gravel road to the reception area, and dined under the wide open blue skies. Fireflies danced among the rose bushes as evening softly surrounded us, and the stars and twinkle lights added to our celebration. Of course, my granddaughter’s father-daughter dance music selection was the opening theme song of the movie, “Pride and Prejudice.” Then, the DJ put on the latest dance music, and the crowd of twenty-somethings danced the night away. The food and bar offerings were greedily devoured. I found the J and D staff kept our needs met unobtrusively but also with a sweet spirit. We just loved everything about this wedding, and it location was a large factor in our celebration. We’re very grateful.

name: John Traylor
text:
Went to J & D Farms to attend the wedding of some friends. It was very hot, though I obviously don't knock the location for that. My main complaint would be that they had to move the chairs from the ceremony area to the reception area. This took about 20 minutes, and left all the guests standing confused in heat. No one came to tell us when they were finished setting up, and we eventually meandered up to the barn where the reception was held. There were also quite a few chiggers (red bugs), at the barn as well. Perhaps this all wasn't to their fault and was resultant of poor planning, though it seemed as though it was.

The parking was also odd, it was about a quarter of a mile from the venue. They had transportation between places in the form of what was basically a golf cart. Though they took forever to come back and forth, resulting in my girlfriend walking up the hill in heels.

Overall the place was quite beautiful, I hate to give this sort of review to such a lovely place, but this was my experience.

resp.text:
Hi John,
Thanks so much for your review and the kind words about the overall beauty of our venue. In regards to the seating in the orchard... we actually have multiple seating options available that do not require seating to be moved from ceremony to the reception. We have over 300 chairs, vintage church pews as well as custom made wood benches. In this case it was requested that the same chairs be utilized at both, ceremony and reception, so we did in fact have to move them... which is a job that  requires about 20 minutes and 6 staff members. We do strongly discourage this option, but ultimately it’s the decision of the bride. :-) As far as instructing guest to make their way to the barn, this would fall under the job of a wedding planner or coordinator, not the venue itself. In regards to chiggars, we do keep all gathering areas around the barn and reception area mowed and well maintained, however we do have 40 acres of Bermuda surrounding the barn, so if you got in any of these areas, a chigger or two is very likely :-). Finally, our parking lot is located on site but 600 feet from the barn. We do this as an effort to keep the ceremony & reception area safe, as well as clear of vehicles for photography purposes. A 6 seater electric (2017 Polaris Gem) shuttle is available for all weddings. The round trip for this takes only 90 seconds, of course that time does vary..  Especially when exiting, as we make every effort to drop guest directly at their car.  Again thank you for the very kind words. We hope you get the opportunity to attend another wedding soon!

name: Megan Hoehn
text:
ABSOLUTELY PERFECT WEDDING DAY!!
When looking for a venue in a town we were unfamiliar with, finding Yolanda and her staff was a god-send. We wanted to avoid the "wedding nightmares" you hear about with vendors falling through or ripping you off or all of the above and we chose wisely. We visited the venue and after meeting Yolanda, we immediately said “this is the one”. We looked no further and this is the only venue we visited. It is as beautiful in person as you see in the many photos on their website and in other bride's pictures. I cannot wait to get our pictures/videos back. It is a family owned business and quite reasonable in the grand scheme of average wedding costs. We had unlimited contact and visits with all staff. We moved to the south a year before getting engaged and decided to have everyone come down to us for a good ol’ southern wedding. The logistics were overwhelming and Yolanda, Candace and Terri were wonderful in making sure everyone was picked up, transported and generally accommodated. They take care of all the major details so for a detail-oriented person like me, it was great because I had time to craft my own little personal touches. We rented out the mansion for the immediate families and wedding party to spend the night with their guests and when we pulled up, we got nothing less than Ooos and Ahhs about how beautiful and serene it all is. Every vendor Yolanda has in her arsenal is remarkable and a joy to work with - she wouldn't have it any other way and that is how you know you're looking at the right venue/planner. The day-of coordinator (Terri) is a MUST-DO for Brides. We actually ate at our wedding! We had our first meal as husband and wife and no one even knew and just assumed the wedding norm ( that you don’t get to eat the delicious food you hand-selected!) It was absolutely incredible. Everyone was so surprised that she answered all of their questions, let them do whatever they wanted within reason and even partied and had a blast with us. You will not find a more flexible venue/planner anywhere. There were bridesmaid's guests that were not a part of the wedding party and while we were off taking pictures or getting ready, she let them hang out, swim in the pool and generally do whatever as if they were at their own homes. In terms of the wedding, she was willing to go above and beyond to make the day special for us. She found us the perfect officiant who let us do a cultural element as part of our ceremony – something they were equally as excited to see executed. We wanted to light off lanterns at the end of the night and she said absolutely. Nothing was out of the realm of possibilities or "against the rules" and that is how your wedding day should be - exactly as you want. Everywhere else we looked there was a “No-no” list of things you cannot do – be out by 11, no open flames, no loud music, etc etc. That list does not exist at Oak Island and they will try to accommodate all of your requests within reason.

If you are looking for a one of a kind wedding experience with seasoned professionals, listen to their advice (they've done way more weddings than you!) and go with Oak Island Weddings. We could not have been happier with our choice.
